title: What are the top 10 songs ever on radio? - Quora

response.answer_text: That is what's known in radio jargon as rotation. This is done to ensure that listeners will hear those top 5 most popular songs. The songs are usually chosen by what is top on the music charts in whatever particular genre the station plays. Listeners usually don't stay tuned in for extended lengths of time, so rotation is used.

If it's on the radio……it's overplayed period. I am anti establishment in the music industry. Indipendent music is everything to me. It's raw, real, edgy, progressive, cutting edge and extreamly enjoyable. Some bands or artists on my short list this week. Cat Clay Peter Munous Alina Baraz Jessie Reyes Russ Two Feet Dope Lemon Diplo
